description:
'''That Dog''' (stylized as '''that dog.''') is a [[Los Angeles]]-based [[rock music|rock]] band that formed in 1992 and disbanded in 1997, reuniting in 2011. The band originally consisted of [[Anna Waronker]] on lead vocals and guitar, [[Rachel Haden]] on bass guitar and vocals, her sister [[Petra Haden]] on violin and vocals, and [[Tony Maxwell]] on drums.

The band's original work drew critical comparisons with the output of [[Redd Kross]], [[Wednesday Week (band)|Wednesday Week]], [[Dolly Mixture (band)|Dolly Mixture]] and [[Buzzcocks]].
